The image shows a billboard advertisemen: with the slogan "There is only one way to live" and a group of apparently homeless people beneath it, suggesting a connection between the advertisement and the homeless individuals.
A similar billboard in the same area was: displaying a different slogan, "Trump is back," which adds credibility to the existence of such billboards in the area.
